name: No more Orcs, please!
description:
This is my Project for the Gdevelop Game Jam #3

Your local tavern owner hired you to keep the orcs out of his tavern. Lately they vandalize his tavern badly, so this has to stop. But your helmet blocks your view, so don't mistake his customers for orcs.

Chase the Highscore! Every stopped orc and every customer gives you 1 Point, but every stopped customer takes 1 Point away, so be careful.

Every customer gives you money and there are three Items to help you out:

The Sign - sends some orcs AND customers away

The Knight - sends some more orcs away

The Potion - teleports all orcs on screen far away

Credits:
